ygData.subject: RE: Letter to GZ - Draft 3
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Spellcasting skills cap at (lvl+1)*5, so yes, it s probably 255 at level 50.  Bear in mind most of the high level bard songs probably didn t exist when
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 30 Sep 1999, Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> Just out of curiosity, do spell casters skills (conjuration, abjuration,
> etc) cap at 200 also? If they do, it may be hard to argue that our
> instrument skills should have higher caps (not that I disagree). If casters
> skills cap at 250-255, I'd say we have a damn good arguement.

Spellcasting skills cap at (lvl+1)*5, so yes, it's probably
255 at level 50. Bear in mind most of the high level bard
songs probably didn't exist when they first set our musical
skill caps at 200. I vote that we add it to the petition.

There is the possibility however that we're capped at 200 for
whatever reason they decided to cap melee skills at 200.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
